title: No Bake Chocolate Cheesecake Bar
directions: To make the chocolate ganache, place the chocolate chipsÂ in a bowl and pour in scalded cream. Cover and leave for 5 minutes then whisk until smooth.
To make the chocolate cheesecake for marbleizing, mix 2 parts cheesecake mixture with one part chocolate ganache and mix until streaks disappear.
ingredients: 2 8- oz packages cream cheese room temperature
